item.title: AFUO welcomes the President of the UWC Eugen Czolij and his wife Hania to Australia
item.description: Управа СУОА вітає Президента Світого Конґресу Українців з дружиною – Ганею до Австралії The Australian Federation of Ukrainian Organisations welcomes the President of the Ukrainian World Congress Eugen Czolij and his wife Hania to Australia Програма Зустрічей з Президентом СКУ у Всіх штатах Австралії: Schedule of meetings: Перт Середа 2-го серпня 2017 год 7.00 веч Wednesday 2 August 7pm Maylands Sport & Rec Club, 50 Clarkson Rd, Maylands 6051

item.title: Tasmanian Ukrainians Celebrate Anniversary of Ukraine's Independence
item.description:
On Sunday 28th of August 2011 the Association of Ukrainians in Tasmania, one of the smaller Ukrainian communities in Australia, whole-heartedly celebrated the 20th Anniversary of Ukraine's Independence. The commemorative event included a church service, keynote speeches and cultural performances. The day was enjoyed by all present.
Church Service prior to celebration
Keynote speeches delivered by Maria Baric (Ukrainian) and Myron Mihal (English)
AUT Committee members: L to R: Myron Mihal ( Secretary ), Maria Baric (President), Leshia Farrow ( Committee) , Peter Ladaniwskyj (Treasurer)
